website_summaries.verdict: A light, rose-scented everyday cleanser that's suitable for all skin types, but works great for dry and sensitive skin.
pros: Locks in tangible moisture and smoothness for up to six hours after use
cons: Some users need to combine with a moisturizing lotion for full hydration

customer_reviews.title: Not the real product...
customer_reviews.text: Would give it less than 1 star if I could - purchased this product for the second time but it is a completely different formula. There is a spelling error in the ingredients, different coloring on the label, and different product smell and texture. DO NOT BUY! Have a feeling the product was tampered with.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's just maybe an old bottle, ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it's just maybe an old bottle, but this did not feel the same on my skin as the bottle of this same product that I got from my facial specialist. Did not have same effect on my skin unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watery
customer_reviews.text: This is a very watery product. You have to use a ton and it doesn't clean your face at all. More of a liquid then a gel.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle King

customer_reviews.title: Best facial cleanser. Does wonders for skin and smells incredible.
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite cleanser since beauty school (6 years). Unfortunately I didn’t keep my license up so I’m unable to get my pro discount so amazon is second best for pricing and getting it quickly. Not only does this cleanser do wonders for skin texture and brightness, it smells absolutely incredible. It’s great for all skin types. I use it daily. I actually received the cleanser faster from this vendor than when I used to order it directly for the Lira website for professionals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cleanser. I’ve been using it for almost 2 years since my esthetician recommended it. It leaves the skin clean without feeling dry. I do use several Lira products so not sure how it works as a stand alone product.
customer_reviews.author: VIVIAN OLMEDO

customer_reviews.title: LIRA Clinical Bio Enzyme Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: The LIRA Clinical Bio Enzyme Cleanser cleans the skins well without stripping the natural oils. I would have rated this product 5 stars except the pump on the 6 oz. bottle I received from did not work. Without the pump there is a tendency to use more product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive, acne prone skin. I’ve tried several different cleaners but always come back to this. Nothing helps keep my skin clear but this. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with how it cleans, cares for my skin and has a pleasant fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For sensitive skin best product
customer_reviews.text: Really good product.I always struggle with acne and my skin is very sensitive, I will highly recommend liras product they are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Kapil G.

customer_reviews.title: Love Lira Clinical!
customer_reviews.text: This gentle cleanser leaves my face clean, smooth and supple. Smells nice and a little goes a long way. Many compliments on my complexion after using this and other Lira Clinical products.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: item as expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected, been using this facial wash for years and works best for my combo to dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: CASSANDRA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect face wash for combination skin
customer_reviews.text: Perfect face wash for combination skin. I have mild acne. This product works wonders. I love the all natural ingredients and how it doesn't over dry my skin.
customer_reviews.author: EMCHI

customer_reviews.title: It's real, and it's a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's real. It came sealed and it's consistency is similar to hyuralonic acid, or a light gel cleanser. It smells like tropical fruit, like it should. It doesn't foam much and should be applied with hands, as it won't work with a clarisonic or a washcloth. It's a big bottle, but you need a few pumps to cleanse your face. It's luxurious and worth the money. It's pH balanced, so you don't need a toner, and your skin will feel hydrated after you cleanse. It's exactly what I expected; I'm not really sure why it was rated poorly by others. My experience with the seller and the product was great. I'll definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hillman

customer_reviews.text: This face wash is absolutely amazing. I was recommended to try it at a skin school I was getting facials at and I haven't switched face washes since. Obviously everyones skin is different so I can't speak for everyone, but I struggle with lots of blackheads and occasional acne breakouts and this face wash and the entire Lira line is fabulous. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice cleanser.
customer_reviews.text: I learned about Lira products from a medical doctor, this cleanser is gentle but thorough. I will continue to buy it from Amazon at their reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: JERi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: My esthetician uses this when I go in for facials so I decided to use this regularly. I love how clear and soft my skin is after using. Lira is now my go-to product line for everything.
customer_reviews.author: B. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended for me to use on my sensitive skin. It’s gentle and does not cause break outs on my adult acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: WorkerBee

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky clean
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. One bottle will last a long time. Your face feels squeaky clean after each wash and it doesn't dry your skin out. I have combination skin of oil and dry that this cleanser helps balance out completely.
customer_reviews.author: DiDi

customer_reviews.title: The best ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best face wash ever. Recommended by my amazing aesthetician. Leaves my skin super soft and smooth, like a noticeably healthier texture than other face washes. I use this, skincueticals alto and face cream and the occasional retinoid cream and it’s 💯💯💯
customer_reviews.author: DanielleC

customer_reviews.title: 10’s across the board!!
customer_reviews.text: I went to go get a microdermabrasion a month ago, and was told that this product was amazing. I’ve been using Lira for a month now, and my skin looks so healthy and clear. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: alvin Greathouse

customer_reviews.title: I love the consistency of this cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love the consistency of this cleanser. It makes my skin so clean and smooth, while being gentle on my skin and around me eye area.
customer_reviews.author: Esther B

customer_reviews.title: Great AND great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: My sister's aesthetician introduced her to this product and she let me try it. I have VERY sensitive skin and this, plus the cleanser, have been wonderful and non-irritating for my skin. I am super excited to see it on Amazon!! I live in FL and can't find it here.
customer_reviews.author: A. Zimmerman

product_meta.title: LIRA CLINICAL BIO Enzyme Cleanser with Plant Stem Cells - Delicate Face Cleanser Recommended For Sensitive and Dry Skin Types (6 Ounce / 278 Milliliter)
product_meta.description:
Lira Clinical products are created by four passionate skincare professionals and educators who wanted to take today's skincare to the next level.
Through this think tank, they created a line with three goals in mind: brighter, healthier, younger-looking skin.

Lira Clinical products are Brightening: Almost every product contains lightening agents and brightening botanicals to even skin tone. 
Lira Clinical products are Healing: Skin health is restored with powerful anti-inflammatory agents, anti-oxidants, and minerals. 
Lira Clinical products are Anti-Aging: Younger looking skin is revealed with powerful peptides, plant stem cells, and precise peel technology.

Lira Clinical Products utilize the highest quality and most technologically advanced ingredients to deliver superior skin care. They produce their products with exclusive formulas using topical probiotics, multiple plant stem cells, advanced peptides, exclusive botanicals, and various skin nourishing vitamins and minerals.


Lira Clinical BIO Enzyme Cleanser with PSC is a gentle gel cleanser specially formulated to easily remove makeup and surface debris that your face comes in contact with over the course of the day. Its hydrating and moisturizing formula is suitable for all skin types, but is particularly recommended in case of hypersensitive, dry, and dehydrated skin. Lira Clinical BIO Enzyme Cleanser with PSC can also be used as post-resurfacing treatment.

BENEFITS:

* A luxury pearlescent cleanser.
* Hydrates and leaves skin smooth.
* Includes anti-inflammatory properties as well as a balanced PH.
* Ideal for hyper-sensitive, dry and dehydrated skin, and post resurfacing treatment.


KEY INGREDIENTS: Pineapple and Papaya Enzymes, Alpine Rose Plant Stem Cells, Grape Plant Stem Cells, Grapefruit Extract

DIRECTIONS: Apply a generous amount to the entire face and massage in. Rinse.
feature_bullets: GENTLE FACE CLEANSER: Lira Clinical BIO Enzyme Cleanser with PSC is the perfect daily face cleanser to remove makeup and surface debris that your face has come in contact with over the course of your day. This delicate formula is powerful enough to deeply clean your skin and gentle enough to be used daily on any skin types.

PLANT STEM CELL COMBINATIONS: Lira Clinical BIO Enzyme Cleanser is enriched with a powerful Plant Stem Cell Combination to help you fight the signs of aging, stimulating the regeneration of dermal connective tissue and firming your skin. We have paired these PSC's to maximize the effectiveness of our products. From brightening to reducing inflammation, we got you covered!
EXCLUSIVE ANTI-INFLAMMATORY PROPERTIES: Lira Clinical BIO Enzyme Cleanser with PSC Formula has exclusive anti-inflammatory properties to calm and heal even the most dry and sensitive skin types.

HYDRATES & MOISTURIZES: Lira Clinical BIO Enzyme Cleanser with PSC never leaves your skin dry or dehydrated. Its unique formula enriched with Grapefruit Extract, Pineapple and Papaya Enzymes hydrates and moisturizes your skin, leaving it clean, soft and smooth.

RECOMMENDED FOR HYPER-SENSITIVE SKIN TYPES: Lira Clinical BIO Enzyme Cleanser with PSC is suitable for all skin types, but is specially recommended in case of hypersensitive, dry, and dehydrated skin. Its hydrating and moisturizing formula makes it also perfect as post resurfacing treatment.
